## characterSet() function

Creates a pattern builder for the character set operator.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function characterSet(...patterns: PatternInput[]): Characters;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

patterns


</td><td>

[PatternInput](./pattern-builder.patterninput.md)<!-- -->\[\]


</td><td>

The patterns to create the character set operator from.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[Characters](./pattern-builder.characters.md)

The pattern builder.

## Example 1

pre-defined pattern with string

```ts
characterSet(alpha, '#!');
// => /[a-zA-Z#!]/
```

## Example 2

pre-defined pattern with pattern

```ts
characterSet(digit, /[a-fA-F]/);
// => /[\da-fA-F]/
```

## Example 3

only string

```ts
characterSet("a", "b", "c");
// => /[abc]/
```
